name: Prohibition in sports arenas, outdoor arenas, stadiums, and amphitheaters
text: [§328J‑5]  Prohibition in sports arenas, outdoor arenas, stadiums, and amphitheaters.  Smoking shall be prohibited in the enclosed or partially enclosed areas and in seating areas of sports arenas, outdoor arenas, stadiums, and amphitheaters. [L 2006, c 295, pt of §2]
